ing: 8 ounces fresh lemon sour (equal parts lemon juice, water and sugar)
des: "A little fizz and a some mango rum add a tropical note to this margarita."
ins: Pour Sauza Blanco Tequila into pitcher with ice.  Then add 4 oz Cruzan Mango and 8 oz fresh lemon sour and pour into pitcher.  Lastly, add 8 oz (diet) lemon-lime soda, stir and serve over ice.  Makes 7 delicious drinks, perfect for any ladies night in.
